metadata.title: CVE-2023-26606 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 6.0.8, there is a use-after-free in ntfs_trim_fs infs/ntfs3/bitmap.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
